text: Baba Ibrahim Suma-Keita (20 April 1947 - 18 July 2020) was a Sierra Leonean long-distance runner. He competed in the marathon at the 1980 Summer Olympics and the 1988 Summer Olympics. Suma-Keita died on 18 July 2020 in Freetown, Sierra Leone at the age of 73. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1947 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Olympians Category:Long- distance runners Category:Sierra Leonean sportspeople
title: Baba Ibrahim Suma-Keita
